For security, passwords should be at least 8 characters long with a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters."},{question:"What happens if I change my username?",answer:"If you change your username, you'll be automatically logged out and redirected to the login page. Please contact your system administrator if you need to delete your account or remove your data from the system."},{question:"How secure is my medical data?",answer:"All medical data is stored securely and encrypted.
